resources.string: WELCOME! This is Coinz. The only way for the capitalist of tomorrow to spend today!Is this your first time playing? Or maybe you just needed a refresher? Then this tutorial will get you out collecting coinz in no time!

Above are the four coinz you\'ll collect daily. Initially you have to be within 25 metres of a coin to collect it.Each has a different daily rate that the Bank will pay you in gold if you deposit them. This rate can be seen in the top right-hand corner of your map.

The Bank - This shows currently collected coins and total gold. You can only deposit 25 coins daily. You can send coins to friends at any time. Coins received from other players are instantly deposited into your account and are not affected by your daily deposit limit.
The Shop - Here you can buy helpful items that can make collecting and depositing coins easier!
The Chat - Here you can chat to other users and make friends to trade coins with!
Lastly, you can sign out of the game or rewatch this tutorial at anytime from the menu in the Map. Now you know the basics, go out there and make some MONEY!
